Chinese.where_ip: 不知道你服务器的IP在哪里，在你心里吗?
Chinese.where_port: 你看看这是正经端口吗？
Chinese.status_connfail: 无法建立服务器连接(服务器脱机，主机名或端口错误？)
Chinese.status_timeout: 连接超时(服务器负载过大？防火墙规则是否放行？)
Chinese.status_known: 连接已建立，但服务器使用未知/不受支持的 SLP 协议。

English.where_ip: Where is the IP of your server?
English.status_connfail: The socket to the server could not be established. (Server offline, wrong hostname or port?)
English.status_timeout: The connection timed out. (Server under too much load? Firewall rules OK?)
English.status_known: The connection was established, but the server spoke an unknown/unsupported SLP protocol.
